title: givemetroncom
author: givemetroncom
created_time: October 01, 2022, 01:44:25 PMLast edit: June 22, 2023, 04:47:29 PM by givemetroncom

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: givemetroncom on October 01, 2022, 01:44:25 PM-snip-Hello and welcome to the forum, for now I will pass and not to visit your webpage since I am not posting from a secured OS.So you want to create a webpage which will focus on listing small casino tokens and tokens in general, and then you also want to have a casino section within this webpage, is that correct?If you are serious about this project you would be great if you could explain to us what will make this webpage appealing to target users and what methodology you will use to list legitimate tokens and coins and avoid scams and catch-grabs. It does not sound like a bad idea, but you need to provide more information and perhaps invest a bit into the development and in a copper-membership, so you can promote your page in a proper way here in Bitcointalk.Coingecko and Coinmarketcap have a lot of failed projects and scam coins listed on the platform, if you somehow managed to include only cryptos that do not tend to go to zero as quickly as the usual scams we all know, then you could even earn some money off this, through some ads and the gambling games you plan to build.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum. There are reasons why project owners have hard time time to get their project listed. Do you really want to list projects that are new that looks promising but in the end it is a scam project. Who would want their platform to be responsible of making their scam project known by many and many got scammed. I personally don't want anything to do with scam project that people know because of my platform. Anyway, that's one of the reason for it and there are more.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: what you posted has nothing to do with casinos, and then most of these projects that you are listing are chitcoins that will make people lose money, many people still keep deceiving themselves that they will invest in these new projects and then they will make big profits, but the time shows them that these new projects are created by people who just want money from investors and once they get that money they abandon the project, wouldn't it be more prudent for people to buy bitcoin or ETH or BNB that are already established altcoins and don't have the risk of the creator disappearing? Is having 2X profit not good? why take the risk of losing everything in these new projects while you can make 2X or 3X profit with coins like BTC, ETH or BNB? I don't understand how some people think

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: givemetroncom on October 01, 2022, 01:44:25 PM~snip~I know gambling is not the topic, but we will add fun games in our future plans. There are free spins for now.in the future:* Nft case opening and Nft Battle = you can deposit your own nft and go to war.  / provably fair* Token rain* Crazy 24-hour crypto jackpot duel / provably fair^Welcome first to the forum, one of the largest crypto gambling communities. To be honest, your website seems to look like a listing of all shitcoins and you are right, this should not be here on the gambling section there is no form of gambling there. I visited your site but it seems it is full of shitcoins that it is not good to invest that most commonly are scams and if it is good then give us the reason. However, good luck with your rare project.

Honeypot(explains everything about the token / detecthoneypot.com) scan is one of them. I try to offer the most reliable platform. always user friendly.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: You should post this first on the Altcoin Services board since you are offering a listing for shitcoins and the gambling part that you are offering is just an extra feature of your website that is not a casino. All topics that will be created in gambling section should be a gambling related service only. And also you can get the right audience there if your main goal is for shitcoin listing.Just move back here this topic once your website already have the gambling feature that you mention on the OP.

This can be their main advantage to attract users on their site.I remember freebitco is a faucet site so obviously, this was their main feature but later on they add casino games and sports betting but they also have a thread In the gambling section other than the faucet section so im thinking that this site can also do the same.
